setting.account_description: This is your public presence on Cursus. You need an account to upload your paid courses, comment on courses, purchased by students, or earning.
setting.links_and_coupon_codes: Links and coupon codes are not permitted in this section.
setting.input_your_linkedin: Input your LinkedIn resource id (e.g. in/johndoe).
setting.notifications: Notifications - Choose when and how to be notified
setting.select_push_and_email: Select push and email notifications you'd like to receive
setting.notify_me_about: Notify me about activity from the profiles I'm subscribed to
setting.notify_me_of_courses: Notify me of courses I might like based on what I watch
setting.notify_me_about_activity: Notify me about activity on my comments on others' courses
setting.notify_me_about_replies: Notify me about replies to my comments
setting.your_emails_are_sent_to: Your emails are sent to gambol943@gmail.com. To unsubscribe from an email, click the "Unsubscribe" link at the bottom of it.
setting.send_me_emails_about: Send me emails about my Cursus activity and updates I requested
setting.if_this_setting_is_turned: If this setting is turned off, Cursus may still send you messages regarding your account, required service announcements, legal notifications, and privacy matters.
setting.promotions_course_recommendations: Promotions, course recommendations, and helpful resources from Cursus.
setting.announcements_from_instructors: Announcements from instructors whose course(s) I'm enrolled in.
setting.to_adjust_this_preference: To adjust this preference by course, leave this box checked and go to the course dashboard and click on "Options" to opt in or out of specific announcements.
setting.show_your_profile: Show your profile on search engines
setting.show_courses_youre_taking: Show courses you're taking on your profile page
setting.want_to_charge_for_a_course: Want to charge for a course? Provide your payment info and opt in for our promotional programs.
setting.if_you_want: If you want your invoices addressed to an academy, leave this blank to use your full name.
setting.sell_more_of_your_exclusive_products: Sell more of your exclusive products of this type (equal to the p on the left) to get % cut from further exclusive sales.
setting.sell_more_of_your_non_exclusive: Sell more of your non-exclusive products of this type (equal to the p on the left) to get 70% cut from every non-exclusive sales.
setting.get_paid_by_credit: Get paid by credit or debit card, PayPal transfer or even via bank account in just a few clicks. All you need is your email address or mobile number.
setting.payoneer_prepaid_mastercard: Payoneer Prepaid MasterCardÂ® or Global Bank Transfer (Payoneer) offers an easy, convenient and cost effective way to get paid.
setting.swift_international_transfer: SWIFT (International Transfer) get paid directly into your bank account. Connected with over 9000 banking organisations, security institutions and customers in more than 200 countries.
setting.affiliate_api_description: The Cursus Affiliate API exposes functionalities of Cursus to help developers build client applications and integrations with Cursus.
setting.to_see_more_details: To see more details, please visit
setting.you_dont_have_any_api: You don't have any API clients yet.
setting.closing_account_warning: If you close your account, you will be unsubscribed from all your 5 courses, and will lose access forever.
setting.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to close your account?
